name: Beet and Red-Onion Salad
recipeCategory: dinner, easy, lunch, salads and dressings
keywords: appetizer, side dish, beet, red onion, spices, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds fresh beets, trimmed and washed
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
1 large red onion, about 1/2 pound, peeled and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Place the beets in a saucepan and cover with water. Add cloves, allspice, bay leaf, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil and simmer for about 20 minutes or until tender throughout. Let cool in the cooking liquid.
Remove the beets and peel them. Slice the beets and place them in a mixing bowl. Add salt, pepper, sugar, vinegar, parsley and onion. Toss well to blend and serve.
